Generation V.Black: Starry skies thousands of light-years away are visible in the space distorted by their intense psychic power.
Generation V.White: They can predict the future from the placement and movement of the stars. They can see Trainers' life spans.
Generation V.Black 2: It can see the future from the movement of the stars. When it learns its Trainer's life span, it cries in sadness.
Generation V.White 2: It can see the future from the movement of the stars. When it learns its Trainer's life span, it cries in sadness.

Generation VI.X: Starry skies thousands of light-years away are visible in the space distorted by their intense psychic power.
Generation VI.Y: They can predict the future from the placement and movement of the stars. They can see Trainers' life spans.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Starry skies thousands of light-years away are visible in the space distorted by their intense psychic power.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: They can predict the future from the placement and movement of the stars. They can see Trainers' life spans.

Generation VIII.Sword: It has tremendous psychic power, but it dislikes conflict. It's also able to predict the future based on the movement of the stars.
Generation VIII.Shield: A criminal who was shown his fate by a Gothitelle went missing that same day and was never seen again.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Gothitelle unleashes psychic energy and shows opponents dreams of the universe’s end. These dreams are apparently ethereal and beautiful.
Generation IX.Violet: It gazes at the stars to predict the future. It acts somewhat detached because it has seen the end of all existence.
